converse.line: Traveling merchant, what goods do you sell?
Only the finest spices around. You want it, I have it. Cumin, basil, cilantro, lavender, you name it.

random.line: Hmm. This saffron looks interesting. What's the price?
Which one is the best value?
Peppercorns add a lot of flavor and are a low cost at #2 per upna.
Oooh. I might be back later to buy some. I don't have the money right now.

converse.line: What's wrong? You seem a bit down.
...If you must know, I am having a fight with my girlfriend.

choice.line: You really know how to make someone feel better.
Talk it out with me. I might be able to help you feel better.
Forgive me for bringing you into this.
So, we were going on a date, right. And right as we were talking, she suddenly got very upset at me and fled. I haven't talked to her in two days because I don't know what I did.

That's awful! You shouldn't leave her alone like that. She'll think you don't care about her enough to see her. Go as soon as you can and apologize. Ask what you did wrong and just be honest. I'm sure it will work out.
Oh, I didn't realize. I feel so stupid now. Thank you for the advice!
You know? I'm going to give you a bundle of spices, on the house. It's the only thanks I can give.
Come back a bit later and I'll have it for you. I need to talk to my girlfriend first.

converse.line: Thanks for waiting, here's Samad's Special Spice Spread.

choice.line: It couldn't have resolved better! I did everything you said and she forgave me. I'm shocked at how you knew just what to do, you love goddess.
Hah! I just know women better than you do. What did she say the problem was?
Oh, she told me not to tell anyone. Sorry.
That's alright. Well, glad it worked out.
Been in the spice business for a while?

Yes. It's a family business. My great, great, great, great grandfather started traveling the world, selling lots of spices and growing in popularity. My father started teaching me the ways of the merchant since I could walk. Now, I continue the legacy.
I can tell you like your job a lot.
